FuncDef: This command configures the PDP type to be signaled in GTP, determining which addresses are requested from the P-GW/GGSN and which hosts are set up afterwards. This can be overridden by RADIUS. If theipv4v6keyword is used, the P-GW/GGSN can fall back to either IPv4 or IPv6.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the GTP connection requests an IPv4 address.
Specifies the GTP connection requests an IPv6 address.
Specifies the GTP connection requests both an IPv4 and an IPv6 address.
